title: indexer.checkpoint@1.0.0
description: Payload proving a materialized view is synchronized to a given height.

viewId.description: Identifier of the materialized view or index.

blockHeight.description: Inclusive block height up to which the view is complete.

blockHash.description: Optional canonical hash of the reference block.

coveredStateRoot.description: Merkle or accumulator root representing indexed coverage.

coveragePercent.description: Optional explicit coverage percentage when partial.

metadata.description: Implementation specific metadata for the checkpoint.
